column2: "Those Message Capsules Ash saw on Ragol are a great idea. Whoever thought of those must be a genius!"
"If you're feeling isolated, reading the messages in those capsules can give you a sense of being connected to someone else."
"When I go back to Ragol, I'm going to leave them behind wherever I go, for whoever comes after me to find."

"When I was talking to Ash, he mentioned the words \"Blue Burst\"...
That got me wondering."

"あたしが知らない未来に起きた
未知の現象……いや、事件？
未来にいったい、何が起きたの？"
"But I guess learning any more would be dangerous. I'll just have to do my best when the time comes. That's the Hunters' way!"

"あたしが行方不明ってことになったら
父さん、心配してくれるかな……"
"When the Central Dome is up and running, we're going to signal the colony ship, Pioneer II. And the Principal of that ship..."
"...is none other than my father, Colin Tyrell. At last... After all these years, we'll be able to see each other again."

"He's stubborn, and annoying, and we always end up fighting, but...
I hope I'll get to see him soon."
"You've done a lot for me. Don't worry, I'll go quietly when the time comes, you'll get no trouble from me."

"え？\u3000いつまでも居て構わない？
うーん……そう言われると、残って
この世界を研究したくなっちゃうな……"

"……なーんてね！\u3000向こうの世界には
やり残したことがある。未来は自分の
手で開拓するよ、ハンターとしてね！"
